Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent; local bombScript = Tool.Bomb
Tool.Enabled = true
function fire(dPos)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local root = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(14130887)
local instances = root:GetChildren() if #instances == 0 then root:Remove() return end
--root = root:FindFirstChild("Cupcake") root = instances[1] if root == nil then return end
local missile = root.Handle:Clone()
missile.CanCollide = true missile.Transparency = 0 missile.Size = Vector3.new(2,2,2) missile.Name = "FuseBomb" missile.Locked = true missile.Elasticity = .9
local spark = Instance.new("Sparkles") spark.Name = "Fuse" spark.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
missile.RotVelocity = Vector3.new((math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20, (math.random()-.5)*20)
if vCharacter.Name == "Backpack" then return end local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position
spawnPos = spawnPos + dPos.unit*5 dPos = dPos - dPos.unit * 5
-- convert to a 2D space deltaXZSquared = dPos.X*dPos.X + dPos.Z*dPos.Z deltaXZ = math.sqrt(deltaXZSquared) deltaY = dPos.Y
--[[print("dPos: ") print(dPos)
print("deltaY: ") print(deltaY)
print("deltaXZ: ") print(deltaXZ)]]--
-- pick a random medium angle (45 +- 45/2 degrees) alpha = math.random()*math.pi/4 + math.pi/8 --alpha = math.pi / 4
missile.Position = spawnPos
-- back-solve for the velocity required to hit the target point --gravity = 196.1643 gravity = 196.1643 numerator = -0.5*gravity*deltaXZSquared denominator = math.cos(alpha)*math.cos(alpha)*(deltaY - math.tan(alpha)*deltaXZ)
--[[print("numerator: ") print(numerator) print("denominator: ") print(denominator)]]--
if denominator == 0 then return end missileSpeed = math.sqrt(numerator / denominator) if missileSpeed > 80 then missileSpeed = 80 end vXZ = missileSpeed * math.cos(alpha) vY = missileSpeed * math.sin(alpha) vX = vXZ * dPos.X / deltaXZ vZ = vXZ * dPos.Z / deltaXZ missile.Velocity = Vector3.new(vX, vY, vZ) --[[print("missileSpeed: ") print(missileSpeed) print("vY: ") print(vY) print("vX: ") print(vX) print("vZ: ") print(vZ)]]--
--local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") --force.force = Vector3.new(0,0,0) --force.force = Vector3.new(0,98,0) --force.force = Vector3.new(0, missile:getMass()*200,0) --force.Parent = missile
local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = vPlayer creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = missile
--local new_script = script.Parent.LaserBlast:clone() --new_script.Disabled = false --new_script.Parent = missile
local new_script = bombScript:clone() new_script.Disabled = false new_script.Parent = missile
missile.Parent = game.Workspace
local cakeBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if cakeBang ~= nil then cakeBang.Volume = 1 cakeBang:Play() end end
function gunUp() --Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,.196, -.981) --Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) --Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,.981, -.196)
for i = 1,20 do upAngle = math.cos(i*math.pi/60) downAngle = math.sin(i*math.pi/60) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, downAngle, -upAngle) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, upAngle, -downAngle) wait(.02) end end
function gunDown()
for i = 1,20 do upAngle = math.cos((20-i)*math.pi/60) downAngle = math.sin((20-i)*math.pi/60) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, downAngle, -upAngle) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, upAngle, -downAngle) wait(.02) end
--Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) --Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1,0,0) --Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,1,0) end function isTurbo(character) return character:FindFirstChild("BoltHelm") ~= nil end
function onEquip()
end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position).unit
--if (isTurbo(character)) then -- reload = .25 -- print("turbo") --end
--gunUp() --[[local reload = 3 for i = 1,5 do local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint --local lookAt = (targetPos - character.Head.Position) local lookAt = targetPos - character.PrimaryPart.Position --if (lookAt.magnitude > 1000) then lookAt = lookAt.unit * 1000 end fire(lookAt) wait(.1) end--]] local reload = 8 local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local lookAt = targetPos-character.PrimaryPart.Position fire(lookAt) --gunDown() wait(reload)
confettiBang = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("ConfettiBang") if confettiBang ~= nil then confettiBang.Volume = 0 end
Tool.Enabled = true end
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquip) script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated)

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)

FuseSound = Instance.new("Sound") FuseSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=13378571" FuseSound.Parent = script.Parent FuseSound:Play()
local total_time = 10 -- seconds local cur_time = 0
function update(frac) script.Parent.Fuse.Color = Color3.new(1,1 - frac,0) end
function blowUp() local sound = Instance.new("Sound") sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\Rocket shot.wav" sound.Parent = script.Parent sound.Volume = 1 sound:play()
for i=1,3 do explosion = Instance.new("Explosion") explosion.BlastRadius = 12 explosion.BlastPressure = 1000000 -- these are really wussy units
-- find instigator tag local creator = script.Parent:findFirstChild("creator") if creator ~= nil then explosion.Hit:connect(function(part, distance) onPlayerBlownUp(part, distance, creator) end) end
explosion.Position = script.Parent.Position + Vector3.new(math.random() - .5, math.random() - .5, math.random() - .5) explosion.Parent = game.Workspace wait(.1) end script.Parent.Transparency = 1 end
function onPlayerBlownUp(part, distance, creator) if part.Name == "Head" then local humanoid = part.Parent.Humanoid tagHumanoid(humanoid, creator) end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, creator) -- tag does not need to expire iff all explosions lethal
if creator ~= nil then local new_tag = creator:clone() new_tag.Parent = humanoid end end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
while cur_time < total_time do update(cur_time / total_time) local e,g = wait(.5) cur_time = cur_time + e end
blowUp() wait(.1) script.Parent:remove()
